name: XWUI Picker Date Range Component
description: Date range picker popup component - the calendar overlay/popup part for date range selection. This is the picker component that displays a calendar for selecting a range of dates. Extends XWUIPicker base class. Typically used with XWUIInputDateRange or standalone.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

separator.description: Separator string between start and end dates in display

placement.description: Placement of the picker relative to trigger element

offset.description: Distance in pixels from trigger element

closeOnClickOutside.description: Whether to close picker when clicking outside

closeOnEscape.description: Whether to close picker on Escape key

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

value.description: Selected date range value (array of two Date objects or strings)
